name: BraveWarriors
description:
Once, a long time ago...

We were five warriors battling the skeleton armies; thieves that stole the treasured golden coins from their sacred place: The Golden Castle. Now, we are are only three: Sir Fox, Sir Lion, and Sir Leopard

Help us return the treasures of our Castle, and to live in peace after we have destroyed our enemies.

If you are ready, this battle begins now

Join us, and prove that you are the one strong enough to aid us.

Good luck...
